description:
01- Lime - Pollard to previous points reduce crown overall by 2m  and remove dead section - leave a height of 5m and width 0.5m
01 - Reduction of the regrowth from previous pruning work to limit the potential risk of limb failure due to the weaker unions present. 
02 - Lime - Pollard to previous points reduce crown overall by 2m - leave a hight of 5m and width 0.5m
02 - Reduction of the regrowth from previous pruning work to limit the potential risk of limb failure due to the weaker unions present.
decision_conditions: The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m.
